ABOUT_ME_TEXT_1: I am a Software Engineer with over a decade of experience in the industry, passionate about creating comprehensive technological solutions. My expertise spans from robust and efficient backend development to attractive and functional frontend adaptations.
ABOUT_ME_TEXT_2: I specialize in frameworks and technologies such as Laravel, Symfony, NodeJs, Angular, React, and Ionic, adapting to the needs of each project to deliver high-quality products. I am also dedicated to the development and deployment of mobile applications for iOS and Android, ensuring smooth and efficient user experiences on mobile devices.
